text: Azim Gök (, born 25 January 1996 in Gonbad-e Kavus) is an Iranian football centre back, who currently plays for Esteghlal.ثبت قرارداد 2 بازیکن دیگر با استقلال/عکس ==Club career== ===Esteghlal=== He made his debut for Esteghlal in 18th fixtures of 2016–17 Persian Gulf Pro League against Sanat Naft Abadan while he substituted in for Ali Ghorbani.http://www.varzesh3.com/news/1389551 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Iranian footballers Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Malavan players Category:People from Gonbad-e Qabus Category:Association football defenders
title: Azim Gök
